usr.documentation: The schema associated with the Edge Node (e.g. Sparkplug B)
The version of MQTT Transmission installed at the Edge Node
The time at which the last rebirth was issued for this Edge Node by MQTT Engine
The reason for the last rebirth request to be issued for this Edge Node by MQTT Engine
The time at which the last NDEATH message was received by MQTT Engine

The time in milliseconds between MQTT Engine receiving of the last message and the payload's reported time. Note: For this to be very accurate the edge node's clock and the system clock running MQTT Engine should be synced
Whether or not the Edge Node is online. This is determined by whether the last lifecycle message was an NBIRTH or NDEATH
The count of rebirth requests issued for this Edge Node by MQTT Engine
Writable tag to 'reset' the Node Info metrics
The time at which the last NBIRTH message was received by MQTT Engine
The number of bytes received from the Edge Node since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Node Info/Reset Info tag
The number of NDEATH messages since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Node Info/Reset Info tag
The current MQTT Server the Edge Node is connected to
The number of bytes sent to the Edge Node since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Node Info/Reset Info tag
The number of NBIRTH messages since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Node Info/Reset Info tag
The last Sparkplug seq number received from the Edge Node
The last bdSeq number sent by the Edge Node in an NBIRTH message
